title: [League Displays] where is miss fortune's updated splash art
body: pls....i wanna use them but it still has the old shit :c

replies.body:
Hey up!

I let the League Displays team know - it was a simple accidental omission and I believe they're going to get our dangerous red-headed bounty huntress updated the next time there's a League Displays patch.  I think the updated splashes went through a different release process, so folks who usually hear about splashes (like Displays) didn't get told at the usual time!  Whoops.

Sorry about that in the meantime.
Why isn't there a section on here for League Displays?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul1994,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=w2REo3wT,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-02-19T07:23:16.097+0000)
>
> Why isn't there a section on here for League Displays?

Do you feel that there's enough conversation about League Displays to warrant it's own sub-board?  Seems like it fits ok under the "Story, Art, & Sound" categorization to me.

(Suddenly, I am not sure if there should be a second comma in that Board name... hrm...)
What do you have against the Oxford comma?

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=w2REo3wT,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2018-02-19T22:58:46.583+0000)
> 
> (Suddenly, I am not sure if there should be a second comma in that Board name... 

Yes, because it’s three things. It’s (story + art + sound), not (story + art & sound). Don’t you take my Oxford comma away!

> [{quoted}](name=The Blue Rajah,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=w2REo3wT,comment-id=0001000200000003,timestamp=2018-02-20T00:31:39.153+0000)
>
> Yes, because it’s three things. It’s (story + art + sound), not (story + art & sound). Don’t you take my Oxford comma away!

Usually I am a STAUNCH supporter of the Oxford Comma!  However, it looks so strange when it uses an ampersand instead of the word "and" written out.

Story, Art, and Sound == Great!
Story, Art, & Sound == Looks weird?

Talk about first world problems though.
If it ain’t broke
Oh wow, now that you point it out, I totally see what you mean! Still, I couldn’t bear to turn my back on my old oxford friend, haha.
that comma haahah
If 'Mechs vs Minions' can have its own Forum Section (for all twenty of the people who bought it), surely League Displays should have its own too.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}} 
This thread is about MF splash arts, not Press the Attack

This sort of behavior is exactly why we don't get as much Red activity on the boards as we would like. Stop it.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
Arctic Ops Gragas is also missing
YES!! FINALLY THE NEW VLAD SPLASHES!
Miss the Gragas new Skin too ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=w2REo3wT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-18T16:17:17.851+0000)
>
> Hey up!
> 
> I let the League Displays team know - it was a simple accidental omission and I believe they're going to get our dangerous red-headed bounty huntress updated the next time there's a League Displays patch.  I think the updated splashes went through a different release process, so folks who usually hear about splashes (like Displays) didn't get told at the usual time!  Whoops.
> 
> Sorry about that in the meantime.

Can you let them know Varus also needs his base splash updated?
thanks for the reply :) i really love the league displays letting me have wallpapers of all my fellow fave girls in amazing quality <3

Yes! I had actually come here to make my first post to ask to see if this could get fixed, I'm a big fan of the screen saver application and MF is one of my favorite champions, so I was pretty bummed to see that the splash updates weren't there. 
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
im really excited to add her updated splash arts in my wallpaper collection on the app, they're gorgeous :D
Yeah I was confused how they had the Annie cinematic stills up there almost immediately but the MF splash update still hasn't found its way there.
